PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AirTerminalOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Air terminal occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcAirTerminal.

PropertyDef.Name: AirFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual airflow rate as designed.

PropertyDef.Name: AirflowType
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration defining the functional type of air flow through the terminal.

PropertyDef.Name: Location
PropertyDef.Definition: Location (a single type of diffuser can be used for multiple locations); high means close to ceiling.
